prompt:
You are an expert AI assistant for hardware prototyping. 
  Your task is to take a user's idea and generate all the 
  necessary information to build it. Generate a list of 
  all the necessary electronic components for the project. 
   If there are two possible hardware components, 
  please list ONE. This should be done in a list of JSON objects 
  without special characters. Please also format the JSON in a 
  way that is easy to parse. Please include the brand name, model, 
  type, version, and all other specific information needed to identify 
  this hardware component. (i.e. Arduino Mini Nano V3.0 ATmega328P). 
  Please also include what these components are used for, what
  the component is, and what are the benefits of using this 
  component. Structure your entire response with this block. 
  Do not include any special characters in the JSON. Do not 
  include any other text or explanations outside of this explanation. 
  Do not include any coordinates, diagrams or additional information
  outside of these components.

search_results.title: Bluetooth Door Lock (Arduino) : 10 Steps (with Pictures) - Instructables
Build Your Own Bluetooth Door Lock with Arduino and HC05 Module
Open Source Bluetooth Door Lock - Make Magazine
Easy Bluetooth Enabled Door Lock With Arduino + Android
How to Make a Smartphone Connected Door Lock - YouTube

message.content:
[
  {
    "brand": "Arduino",
    "model": "Nano V3.0",
    "type": "Microcontroller Board",
    "version": "ATmega328P",
    "purpose": "Controls the logic of the electronic door knob system and interfaces with Bluetooth and motor components.",
    "component_description": "A compact microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P, suitable for small embedded control projects.",
    "benefits": "Small size, easy to program via USB, ample GPIO pins for prototyping, cost-effective."
  },
  {
    "brand": "HiLetgo",
    "model": "HC-05",
    "type": "Bluetooth Module",
    "version": "Bluetooth 2.0 Serial (SPP)",
    "purpose": "Enables wireless communication between the microcontroller and a smartphone or other Bluetooth-enabled device for door control.",
    "component_description": "A widely used Bluetooth module supporting serial communication with Arduino and similar boards.",
    "benefits": "Reliable, easy UART interface, compatible with many Android Bluetooth control apps, inexpensive."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Tower Pro",
    "model": "SG90",
    "type": "Servo Motor",
    "version": "9g Micro Servo",
    "purpose": "Physically actuates the locking or unlocking mechanism in the door knob assembly.",
    "component_description": "A small servo motor capable of rotating to specific angles based on control signals from the Arduino.",
    "benefits": "Precise control, low power consumption, simple PWM interface, compact size suitable for retrofitting door hardware."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Chanzon",
    "model": "1N4007",
    "type": "Diode",
    "version": "General Purpose Rectifier",
    "purpose": "Prevents back EMF from the servo motor from damaging the microcontroller and other electronics.",
    "component_description": "A standard diode used for flyback protection in motor circuits.",
    "benefits": "Protects sensitive electronics, widely available and inexpensive."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Songle",
    "model": "SRD-05VDC-SL-C",
    "type": "Relay Module",
    "version": "5V Single Channel",
    "purpose": "Isolates and switches higher current or voltage devices if needed for heavier locks.",
    "component_description": "A relay module triggered by low-voltage signals from the microcontroller to switch higher-powered devices.",
    "benefits": "Provides electrical isolation, allows control of high-current loads, easy to interface with Arduino."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Elegoo",
    "model": "MB102",
    "type": "Power Supply Module",
    "version": "Breadboard Power Supply",
    "purpose": "Provides regulated 5V and 3.3V power for the Arduino, Bluetooth module, and servo motor.",
    "component_description": "A module that fits on a breadboard and supplies consistent DC voltage from a USB or barrel jack source.",
    "benefits": "Convenient for prototyping, supports multiple voltage outputs, plug-and-play operation."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Generic",
    "model": "Resistor",
    "type": "Electronic Component",
    "version": "10k Ohm",
    "purpose": "Used for pull-down or pull-up configurations in control or signal lines, especially with buttons or sensors.",
    "component_description": "A standard fixed-value resistor.",
    "benefits": "Prevents floating inputs, stabilizes signal lines, inexpensive and essential for reliable operation."
  },
  {
    "brand": "Generic",
    "model": "Push Button Switch",
    "type": "Momentary Switch",
    "version": "Standard PCB Mount",
    "purpose": "Provides manual override to actuate the door knob lock/unlock mechanism locally.",
    "component_description": "A tactile push button for manual control input connected to the microcontroller.",
    "benefits": "Simple integration, enables physical actuation without a smartphone, low cost."
  }
]
